Windlord :

Windlord arrived where Rodimus were the had to plans and it was time 
to applied one. "My love"thought Winlord while he was 
arriving "Come, I need you here, my dear love"


"Rodimus"said sofly Windlord "I know that you're willing to save 
her... I know that you wish see her back...."

Windlord walked slowly towards him and added "But listen me, my 
friend, If you go close to the base... Hydras will kill you, and 
when Nightlight comes back she will be broken hearted... You heard 
what said that scum... She will die if the program, virus... 
whatever is detecteds a not allowed reprogramation... That means 
that that scum knows how retire it... But we have to get her and 
capture him, for that you will need repair your wounds and we need a 
plan... She will be watched for a while and would be imposible and 
suicide try to rescue her right now... Come my friend, you need rest 
and heal your wounds"

OOC: Is he in robot mode?
